Detailed Description

Interface for objects that want to receive notification when the value of a ValueState changes.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Planner::ValueState::Observer::observe_value_change ( double  change  )  [pure virtual]

Method called by a ValueState when its value changes.

Parameters:
change The weighted difference between the new and old values, weighted by the probability given to the ValueState in add_observer(). A positive change implies the value increased.

Implemented in Planner::DecisionState::Action.
